00064 CelestialWidget::CelestialWidget( QWidget* parent )
00065 :QWidget( parent ), sphereRadio( 120.0 ), m_declination( 0 ), m_rightAscension( 0 )
00066 {
00067         QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00068         setLayout( mainLayout );
00069 
00070         QWidget* examinerWidget = new QWidget;
00071         examinerWidget->setFixedSize( 490, 300 );
00072         mainLayout->addWidget(examinerWidget);
00073 
00074         m_rootNode = new SoSeparator;
00075 
00076         m_rootNode->addChild( Ejes() );
00077         m_rootNode->addChild( Sphere() );
00078         m_rootNode->addChild( CelestialEquator() );
00079         m_rootNode->addChild( Ecliptic() );
00080         m_rootNode->addChild( Points() );
00081         m_rootNode->addChild( RightAscension() );
00082         m_rootNode->addChild( Declination() );
00083         m_rootNode->addChild( Star() );
00084 
00085         SoQtExaminerViewer* myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( examinerWidget );
00086         myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_rootNode );
00087         SbColor col( 0.86f, 0.86f, 0.86f );
00088         myRenderArea->setBackgroundColor(col);
00089         myRenderArea->show( );
00090 
00091         QWidget* labelsWidget = new QWidget;
00092         mainLayout->addWidget( labelsWidget );
00093         QGridLayout* labelsLayout = new QGridLayout;
00094         labelsWidget->setLayout( labelsLayout );
00095 
00096         QLabel* m_rightLabel = new QLabel;
00097         m_rightLabel->setText( "Right Ascension:" );
00098         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_rightLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1 );
00099 
00100         m_rightValue = new QLabel;
00101         m_rightValue->setText( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00102         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_rightValue, 0, 1, 1, 3 );
00103 
00104         QLabel* m_declinationLabel = new QLabel;
00105         m_declinationLabel->setText( "Declination:" );
00106         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_declinationLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1 );
00107 
00108         m_declinationValue = new QLabel;
00109         m_declinationValue->setText( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00110         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_declinationValue, 1, 1, 1, 3 );
00111 }

00117 void CelestialWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00118 {
00119         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;
00120         m_rightValue->setText( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00121         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00122         m_declinationValue->setText( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00123 
00124         //Right Ascension
00125         SoSeparator* ascension = RightAscension();
00126         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, ascension );
00127 
00128         //Declination
00129         SoSeparator* declination = Declination();
00130         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, declination );
00131 
00132         //Star
00133         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00134         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 7, star );
00135 }

00137 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::CelestialEquator() const
00138 {
00139         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00140 
00141         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00142         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.80f); // Olive
00143         ecuador->addChild(myMaterial);
00144 
00145         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00146         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00147         ecuador->addChild( drawstyle );
00148 
00149         float p[360][3];
00150         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; ++fi )
00151         {
00152                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00153                 p[fi][1] = 0.0;
00154                 p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00155 
00156         }
00157 
00158         int lines[1]={360};
00159         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00160         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00161         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00162 
00163         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00164         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00165         ecuador->addChild(lineset);
00166 
00167         return ecuador;
00168 }
00169 
00170 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Declination()
00171 {
00172         //Decliantion
00173         SoSeparator* declination = new SoSeparator;
00174 
00175         SoMaterial* declinationMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00176         declinationMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0f, 0.5f, 0.0 ); // Green
00177         declination->addChild( declinationMaterial );
00178 
00179         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00180         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00181         declination->addChild( drawstyle );
00182 
00183         float declinationPoints[360][3];
00184 
00185         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; ++theta )
00186         {
00187                 double grad = ( m_declination / 360 ) * theta;
00188                 declinationPoints[theta][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad )* sphereRadio;
00189                 declinationPoints[theta][1] = sin( grad ) * sphereRadio;
00190                 declinationPoints[theta][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad ) * sphereRadio ;
00191         }
00192 
00193         int declinationLines[1] = {360};
00194         SoCoordinate3 * declinationCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00195         declinationCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, declinationPoints );
00196         declination->addChild( declinationCoord3 );
00197 
00198         SoLineSet* decliantionLine=new SoLineSet;
00199         decliantionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, declinationLines );
00200         declination->addChild( decliantionLine );
00201 
00202 
00203         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00204         declination->addChild( curve );
00205 
00206         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00207         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 ); // Orange
00208         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00209 
00210         float curvePoints[270][3];
00211         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00212 
00213         int numPoints = 0;
00214         int indexes[360];
00215         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; ++index )
00216         {
00217                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00218                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00219                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00220                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00221                 numPoints++;
00222 
00223                 double grad1 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00224                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* sphereRadio;
00225                 curvePoints[numPoints][1] = sin( grad1 ) * sphereRadio;
00226                 curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 ) * sphereRadio ;
00227                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00228                 numPoints++;
00229 
00230                 double grad2 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00231                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* sphereRadio;
00232                 curvePoints[numPoints][1] = sin( grad2 ) * sphereRadio;
00233                 curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad2 ) * sphereRadio ;
00234                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00235                 numPoints++;
00236 
00237                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) + 3 ] = -1;
00238 
00239          }
00240 
00241         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00242         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00243         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00244 
00245         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00246         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00247         curve->addChild( facet );
00248 
00249         return declination;
00250 }

00252 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Ecliptic() const
00253 {
00254         SoSeparator* ecliptic = new SoSeparator;
00255 
00256         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00257         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.80f, 0.80f, 0.0f); // Olive
00258         ecliptic->addChild(myMaterial);
00259 
00260         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00261         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00262         ecliptic->addChild( drawstyle );
00263 
00264         float p[360][3];
00265         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; ++fi )
00266         {
00267                 p[fi][0] = cos( tgc::Ecliptic ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00268                 p[fi][1] = sin( tgc::Ecliptic ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00269                 p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00270         }
00271 
00272         int lines[1]={360};
00273         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00274         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00275         ecliptic->addChild(coord3);
00276 
00277         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00278         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00279         ecliptic->addChild(lineset);
00280 
00281         return ecliptic;
00282 }

00284 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Ejes() const
00285 {
00286          SoSeparator* polos = new SoSeparator;
00287 
00288         SoSeparator* eje = new SoSeparator;
00289         polos->addChild( eje );
00290 
00291         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00292         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0); // Red
00293         eje->addChild(myMaterial);
00294 
00295         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00296         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00297         eje->addChild( drawstyle );
00298 
00299         float p[2][3]={ {0.0, -sphereRadio-40, 0.0}, {0.0, sphereRadio+40, 0.0} };
00300 
00301         SoCoordinate3* coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00302         coord3->point.setValues(0, 2, p);
00303         eje->addChild(coord3);
00304 
00305         int lines[1]={2};
00306         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00307         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00308         eje->addChild(lineset);
00309 
00310         //North celestial pole
00311         SoSeparator* norte = new SoSeparator;
00312 
00313         SoMaterial* norteMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00314         norteMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ); // Red
00315         norte->addChild( norteMaterial );
00316 
00317         SoTransform* norteTransf = new SoTransform;
00318         norteTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, sphereRadio+30, 0.0 ) );
00319         norte->addChild( norteTransf );
00320 
00321         SoText2* northText= new SoText2();
00322         northText->string.setValue("North celestial pole");
00323         northText->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00324         norte->addChild( northText );
00325         polos->addChild( norte );
00326 
00327         //South celestial pole
00328         SoSeparator* south = new SoSeparator;
00329 
00330         SoMaterial* southMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00331         southMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ); // Red
00332         south->addChild( southMaterial );
00333 
00334         SoTransform* southTransf = new SoTransform;
00335         southTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, -sphereRadio-30, 0.0 ) );
00336         south->addChild( southTransf );
00337 
00338         SoText2* southText= new SoText2();
00339         southText->string.setValue("South celestial pole");
00340         southText->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00341         south->addChild( southText );
00342         polos->addChild( south );
00343 
00344         return polos;
00345 }

00348 {
00349         SoSeparator* points = new SoSeparator;
00350 
00351         //Earth
00352         SoSeparator* earth = new SoSeparator;
00353         points->addChild(earth);

00356         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.8f, 0.8f, 0.9f); // Blue
00357         earth->addChild(myMaterial);

00360         earthSphere->radius=5;
00361         earth->addChild(earthSphere);
00362 
00363         //AriesPoint
00364         SoSeparator* aries = new SoSeparator;
00365         points->addChild(aries);
00366 
00367         SoSeparator* ariesPoint = new SoSeparator;
00368         aries->addChild(ariesPoint);

00371         ariesMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.9f); // Blue
00372         ariesPoint->addChild(ariesMaterial);

00375         ariesTransform->translation.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, sphereRadio );
00376         ariesPoint->addChild( ariesTransform);
00377 
00378         SoSphere* ariesSphere=new SoSphere;
00379         ariesSphere->radius=5;
00380         ariesPoint->addChild(ariesSphere);
00381

00386         ariesTextMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ); // Red
00387         ariesText->addChild( ariesTextMaterial );
00388 
00389         SoTransform* ariesTextTransf = new SoTransform;
00390         ariesTextTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, sphereRadio+30 ) );
00391         ariesText->addChild( ariesTextTransf );
00392 
00393         SoText2* textNode= new SoText2();
00394         textNode->string.setValue("Aries");
00395         textNode->justification = SoText2::CENTER;
00396         ariesText->addChild(textNode);
00397 
00398         //Libra Point
00399         SoSeparator* libra = new SoSeparator;
00400         points->addChild(libra);
00401 
00402         SoSeparator* libraPoint = new SoSeparator;
00403         libra->addChild(libraPoint);
00404 
00405         SoMaterial* libraMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00406         libraMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.9f); // Blue
00407         libraPoint->addChild(libraMaterial);
00408 
00409         SoTranslation* libraTransform = new SoTranslation;
00410         libraTransform->translation.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, -sphereRadio );
00411         libraPoint->addChild( libraTransform);
00412

00437 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::RightAscension()
00438 {
00439         //Right Ascension
00440         SoSeparator* ascension = new SoSeparator;
00441 
00442         SoSeparator* right = new SoSeparator;
00443         ascension->addChild( right );
00444 
00445         SoMaterial* ascensionMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00446         ascensionMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 ); // Orange
00447         right->addChild( ascensionMaterial );
00448 
00449         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00450         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00451         right->addChild( drawstyle );
00452 
00453         float ascensionPoints[360][3];
00454         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; ++fi )
00455         {
00456                 double grad = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * fi;
00457                 ascensionPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad )* sphereRadio ;
00458                 ascensionPoints[fi][1] = 0.0;
00459                 ascensionPoints[fi][2] = cos( grad ) * sphereRadio ;
00460         }
00461 
00462         int ascensionLines[1] = {360};
00463         SoCoordinate3 * ascensionCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00464         ascensionCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, ascensionPoints );
00465         right->addChild( ascensionCoord3 );
00466 
00467         SoLineSet* ascensionLine=new SoLineSet;
00468         ascensionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, ascensionLines );
00469         right->addChild( ascensionLine );
00470 
00471         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00472 
00473         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00474         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 ); // Orange
00475         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00476 
00477         float curvePoints[270][3];
00478         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00479 
00480         int numPoints = 0;
00481         int indexes[360];
00482         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; ++index )
00483         {
00484                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00485                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00486                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00487                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00488                 numPoints++;
00489 
00490                 double grad1 = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00491                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 )* sphereRadio ;
00492                 curvePoints[numPoints][1] = 0.0;
00493                 curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( grad1 ) * sphereRadio ;
00494                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00495                 numPoints++;
00496 
00497                 double grad2 = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00498                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 )* sphereRadio ;
00499                 curvePoints[numPoints][1] = 0.0;
00500                 curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( grad2 ) * sphereRadio ;
00501                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00502                 numPoints++;
00503 
00504                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4 ) + 3 ] = -1;
00505         }
00506 
00507         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00508         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00509         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00510

00513         curve->addChild( facet );
00514

00519 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Sphere() const
00520 {
00521         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00522 
00523         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00524         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f ); // Blue
00525         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00526         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00527 
00528         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00529         complexity->value = 0.5;
00530         sph->addChild( complexity );
00531 
00532         SoSphere* sphere = new SoSphere;
00533         sphere->radius = sphereRadio;
00534         sph->addChild( sphere );
00535 
00536         return sph;
00537 }
00538 
00539 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Star()
00540 {
00541         //Star definition
00542         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00543 
00544         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00545         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0); // yellow
00546         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00547 
00548         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00549         starTransform->translation.setValue( cos( m_declination )* sin( m_rightAscension ) * sphereRadio, sin( m_declination ) * sphereRadio, cos( m_declination )* cos( m_rightAscension) * sphereRadio ) ;
00550         star->addChild( starTransform);
00551 
00552         SoSphere* starSphere=new SoSphere;
00553         starSphere->radius=10;
00554         star->addChild(starSphere);
00555 
00556         return star;
00557 }
